data.title: F1® 22
data.header: Podium Pass Series 3 Update adds F2™ 2022 with more to come
data.description: Also includes special McLaren livery and the return of an F1® champion

data.title: F1® 22
data.description: Get to grips with everything in patch 1.12, including F2™    2022 and fixes for crashes on Steam Deck and parc ferme rules not applying

data.title: F1® 22
data.description: Battles across the grid are reflected in the latest F1® 22’s driver ratings

data.title: F1® 22
data.description: Shanghai International Circuit, a special Ferrari livery, fixes to kerb impact behaviour, telemetry information in race strategies & more

data.title: F1® 22
data.header: China returns in the latest F1® 22 free update
data.description: Shanghai International Circuit, a special Ferrari livery, and a Moon Festival event have been added to the game

data.title: F1® 22
data.description: From today, you’ll be able to race the fastest motorsport around with players across all platforms as cross-play arrives in F1® 22.
